title: Global Shortages During Coronavirus Reveal Failings of Just in Time Manufacturing
description: Global shortages of many goods reflect the disruption of the pandemic combined with decades of companies limiting their inventories.
dc:creator: Peter S. Goodman and Niraj Chokshi
media:credit: Nitashia Johnson for The New York Times
media:description: The empty shelves at a Target store in Dallas last June highlight how companies of all types were unprepared for a crisis.
